title: YOLO11-4K: An Efficient Architecture for Real-Time Small Object Detection in 4K Panoramic Images
summary: The processing of omnidirectional 360-degree images poses significant challenges for object detection due to inherent spatial distortions, wide fields of view, and ultra-high-resolution inputs.
